title: I got a cool idea on how they could make Yone a champion.
body: So lore wise apparently Yone is dead but what if they did a lore event and The Harrowing invaded Ionia and somehow karthus was able to ressurect Yone's body into an Undead corpse. Basically we would be having an undead samurai champ which would be cool asf and if you cant imagine it then think of this guy as Yone. http://onepiece.wikia.com/wiki/Ryuma  leave a comment on what you guys think.
